verses.roman:
ye divasa prabhu sannyāsīre kṛpā kaila
se divasa haite grāme kolāhala haila

synonyms: ye divasa—the day when; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sannyāsīre—to the Māyāvādī sannyāsīs; kṛpā kaila—showed His mercy; se divasa haite—beginning from that day; grāme—in the locality; kolāhala haila—there were many talks about this incident.
translation: Beginning from the day on which Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu showed His mercy to the Māyāvādī sannyāsīs, there were vivid discussions about this conversion among the inhabitants of Vārāṇasī.
